h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White (Round Two)
content: Since you'll need to fully defeat him this round, it's more than likely that you'll end up smashing through the defense from his weapon and removing the bar entirely. Unfortunately, this isn't necessarily a good thing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White (Round Two)'.
The content is as follows:
Since you'll need to fully defeat him this round, it's more than likely that you'll end up smashing through the defense from his weapon and removing the bar entirely. Unfortunately, this isn't necessarily a good thing.
